text:
Kami Phillips, E-Commerce Editor: If you’re looking to do good and help dad look super stylish then this is the perfect gift! One dad who will definitely be rocking it? Jerry Seinfeld, whose wife Jessica founded the Good+ Foundation, and about whom Jessica says, “I would call Jerry the opposite of a ‘helicopter parent.’ He does not micromanage their lives in any way. What makes him an especially spectacular father is his calm, funny, and nurturing way with our kids. He listens to them, loves to play, and understands them deeply. Dinnertime at our house is important to him, with no phones allowed at the table. There is, however, a lot of sarcasm and laughter, as one might imagine.”

The Good+ Foundation provides a safety net of social services, education and support for families living in poverty. Mr Porter has joined forces with them for Father’s Day 2018 and will be donating 100 percent of purchases of a collection of exclusive white shirts to the foundation. Choose from high-end designers such as Tom Ford or Brunello Cucinelli or more affordable styles from Polo Ralph Lauren, Mr. P and many more!

Buy It! Mr. P Shirt, $200; mrporter.com
